title: The complete works of Robert Burns: containing his poems, songs, and correspondence.
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: — Breakfast with Captain Forrester — Ochel Hills — Devon River — Forth

title: To arms! :
author: Balfour, Andrew
snippet: As the gray dawn and the mist of a winter's morning mingled to cheer and further chill us, we clattered on the road to Dollar, a tiny hamlet by the Devon River, with away beyond it the round-backed hills of Ochil.
